tool.help:
Run PICRUSt: Predict Metagenome -------------------------------------- This module produces a 'virtual' metagenome of KEGG Ortholog abundances for each sample in the given OTU table.
**Input file:** This should be a normalized OTU table populated by the output of the PICRUSt:Normalize by Copy Number module.
For more information please visit: ---------------------------------- http://picrust.github.com/
